markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Medical Researcher](/Feats.aspx?ID=2170) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 72</row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9)

</column>

---

Kassi has taught you not only how to apply medicines with your medical skills but how to craft them as well. When you [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=43) [healer's kits](/Equipment.aspx?ID=25), [vaccines](/Equipment.aspx?ID=773), [addiction suppressants](/Equipment.aspx?ID=774), [antidotes](/Equipment.aspx?ID=80), [antiplagues](/Equipment.aspx?ID=81), [elixirs of life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=91), or other non-magical medical or healing items, you can use [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) instead of [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4).

<title level="2">Kassi's Techniques</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 71</row>

While Kassi shares her greatest discoveries with the entire medical community, some of her techniques are either still experimental or extremely difficult to perform. Any students who Kassi takes on gain access to her techniques.

**Related Feats**: [Paragon Battle Medicine](/Feats.aspx?ID=2171)
name: Medical Researcher
